description: Book and manage patient appointments automatically.
Automatically draft and email legal documents.
Auto-generate property listings with photos and pricing.
Auto-generate and send invoices via email.
Track and auto-adjust product prices across marketplaces.
Rank and filter resumes using keyword matching.
Manage and report on donations and tax receipts.
Create quotes based on materials, labor, and overhead.
Auto-update website keywords and descriptions via Google Trends.
